title: Valley Forge National Historical Park: Secrets and Spies
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Historic Tales     Secrets and Spies                Secrets and Spies              George Washington needs your help! There’s rumor of a plot to have him kidnapped at Valley Forge. Be the first to enlist and join an American spy network to uncover the traitors involved. Wind your way through the area surrounding Washington's Headquarters to help unravel the mystery. The program is presented with children in mind, but fun for participant's of any age!  Meet at the Washington's Headquarters Train Station There is no charge, the program is free.   June 11 - 12:30 June 18 - 12:30 and 2:00 June 25 - 12:30 July 2 - 12:30 and 2:00 July 9, 16, 23 and 30 - 12:30 August 6 - 12:30 August 13 - 12:30 and 2:00
